articles.author: Anup Roy, Khine Lin Kyaw
articles.title: Clearing Union Dominated by India Moves Toward Rupee Settlements - Bloomberg
articles.description: Nine central banks linked to a South Asia-focused clearing house have reached a consensus to settle trade in local currencies, including the Indian rupee, to reduce dependence on the US dollar and the euro.

articles.author: Team Newsable
articles.title: Making history with 42 digits: Researchers solve three-decade-old problem in mathematics - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: Scientists at Paderborn University and KU Leuven have unlocked a three-decade-old mystery of mathematics with the so-called ninth Dedekind number.
